analysis.significance: Shows Epstein sharing international financial news with business contacts

analysis.summary: Jeffrey Epstein emails Sultan Bin Sulayem about Sberbank taking over Capital Group's $400 million Gorod Stolits real estate project in Moscow, sharing business news with the phrase 'just as we thought' indicating prior discussion or expectation of this development.
